mapper.select: SELECT sr.ID, sr.STUDENTS_DATE, a.NAME, sr.LEARNING_CONTENTS, sr.UNDERSTANDING, sr.UNDERSTANDING_DETAIL, sr.TEACHER_SUPPORT, sr.QUESTION FROM accounts a LEFT OUTER JOIN studentsreports sr on a.ID = sr.USER_ID where a.COURSE_NAME_ID = #{courseNameId} and a.ROLE = 5 and sr.STUDENTS_DATE = #{studentsDate} ;
